li.The minor is not open to chemistry major: The minor is not open to chemistry majors.

courseSection0.text: The minor is not open to chemistry majors.

li.A minimum GPA of 2.0 is required in all: A minimum GPA of 2.0 is required in all courses used to satisfy the minor.
li.Grades below \"C\" (2.0) in lower level: Grades below "C" (2.0) in lower level courses are not accepted.
li.At least 11 hours used in the minor must: At least 11 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the Department of Chemistry, with a minimum GPA of 2.0.
li.Students must satisfy each course's prer: Students must satisfy each course's prerequisites before enrolling in the class.

courseSection0.text:
Minor Requirements
A minimum GPA of 2.0 is required in all courses used to satisfy the minor.
Grades below "C" (2.0) in lower level courses are not accepted.
At least 11 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the Department of Chemistry, with a minimum GPA of 2.0.
Prerequisite Courses
Students must satisfy each course's prerequisites before enrolling in the class.

courseSection1.text0:
Earn at least 8 credits from the following types of courses: 
At least one course must be selected from Group I and the remaining from Group I and/or II.
courseSection1.text1:
Group I: 

BCH 4103L - Biochemical Methods Credit Hours: 2
CHM 3411L - Physical Chemistry Laboratory Credit Hours: 2
CHM 3215L - Organic Laboratory Techniques II Credit Hours: 2
CHM 4130 - Advanced Analytical Laboratory Technique Credit Hours: 3
CHM 5451C - Techniques in Polymer Science Credit Hours: 3
CHS 3530C - Forensic Analysis of Controlled Substances Credit Hours: 4
courseSection1.text2:
Group II:

BCH 4053 - Biochemistry I Credit Hours: 3
BCH 4054 - Biochemistry II Credit Hours: 3
CHM 3410 - Physical Chemistry I Credit Hours: 4
CHM 3411 - Physical Chemistry II Credit Hours: 3
CHM 3422 - Applied Physical Chemistry Credit Hours: 3
CHM 4220 - Organic Chemistry III Credit Hours: 3
CHM 5225 - Advanced Organic Chemistry Credit Hours: 3
CHM 5235 - Applied Molecular Spectroscopy Credit Hours: 3
CHM 5450 - Polymer Chemistry Credit Hours: 3
CHS 4615 - Environmental Chemistry Credit Hours: 3
courseSection1.text3: Additional upper level courses may be taken as approved.

li.Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study: Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.

courseSection0.text:
Total Undergraduate Credit Hours Required: 28

Other Requirements
Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.
